bibl.title: The Practice of Taxation in Three Late Ptolemaic Papyri.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: The texts. [(Re-)publication of these texts in the series P. Tebt. by Brian MUHS and Fr.A.J.H. is planned for the near future.] - The tax. - The list of taxpayers. - The assessments of the tax income. - The account of expenses. - The payments made for officials. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.seg: HOOGENDIJK Francisca A.J., The Practice of Taxation in Three Late Ptolemaic Papyri.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 313-321, 2 tabl.

The texts. [(Re-)publication of these texts in the series P. Tebt. by Brian MUHS and Fr.A.J.H. is planned for the near future.] - The tax. - The list of taxpayers. - The assessments of the tax income. - The account of expenses. - The payments made for officials. - Conclusions.
